name: Journey Of The Twin Ninjas
description:
Journey Of The Twin Ninjas was made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1. It features two characters who need to work together in order to collect all of the crystal shards scattered throughout each level. The further progress is made, the more co-operation is needed to collect the shards hence fitting the theme " Stronger Together". 

Tip for if you get stuck: Remember, teamwork makes the dreamwork! Use the game mechanics to your advantage!

Good luck and most importantly;  Enjoy!

Also I had forgotten to add this amazing asset creator in the credits so I'm glad to add this here for everyone to see :D;

                            2D Free Crystal Set - diluck , Unity Asset Store!

Thank You!
